Monero ( $XMR ) has performed another scheduled upgrade hard fork successfully, slashing transaction sizes, increasing privacy and reducing fees.  Along with digital cash coins like $DASH , it continues to demonstrate that hard forks are a viable mechanism of upgrading protocols.
